name: Claude Sales
description: An agent that uses Anthropic's sales knowledge work plugin and powered by Claude Sonnet 4.5
long_description: An agent that uses Anthropic's sales knowledge work plugin and powered by Claude Sonnet 4.5. Agents: claude-sales (ChatBot). Models: gpt-5.2.
